== Kondotty (CT) (627468) ==

Kondotty (CT) is a town in the [[Ernad]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 10.86 sq. km. and harbouring 5436 households with total population of 28794 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 375 km. Male population is 14036 and female population is 14758. Scheduled Caste population is 3139 and Scheduled Tribes population is 37. Census Location Code of the town is 627468<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 22 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 30 km. Railway station is at Feroke at a distance of 15 km.
